title: Perma Banned for NO reason?!?!
body: Why am i perma banned? i played a game yesterday morning with my friend, then i got off, and when i tried to log in this morning im permabanned??????????? I never got anything for an email or anything?! HELP PLEASE!

replies.body: Hey there, it looks like the account was locked but not for a behavioral issue.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so a specialist can offer more context and find some options for you.

Sometimes it may take a while before you receive this information. I would suggest either waiting a few hours or up to a day, or creating a support ticket for this issue. After you get the information, if you believe the ban was unjustified, feel free to argue your case. Many people have gotten their permanent bans reversed for legitimate reasons.
